thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 4 of 175
thread.title: Jenny Knight

author: Jenny Knight
title: Jenny Knight
text:
It is a good site to join for opportunities of finding a house sitter or for becoming one.
My experience has shown you have to check your site regularly for messages and sometimes when you go to reply because the house sit has already gone then your message does not appear to be sent as the opportunity is closed.
However, there is a feature that says send anyway - which I have ticked but do not know if my message reached its destination.
I am fairly new to trusted Housesitters so Maybe you just have to be quick off the mark as there must be lots of people applying.
I have done one Housesit for 3 cats and am about to do another house sit so it does work.
